page.title: 01GILLING WEST-The Area
page.content: Our area of{NORTH YORKSHIRE}is mostly arable{farmland}and{woods}. There's a lot of{wildlife}. There is a {beck}running through the area. About twelve years ago a Viking sword was found here. {Hartforth}is a tiny village in the area. It is very old and all the houses are made of stone. There is an old{chapel}and also an old{church} which is not used any more. {Gilling}is an ancient village which lies in a valley. It has a{Norman} {church,}a primary school,a police station and a post office with shop. There is a village hall which has activities during the week and two pubs. At the top of the bank there's a caravan site. Running along the top of the bank is the{A66,}which is the main road to the North.
